conbody.p: pipeline propertiesmaximum memorymemorymaximum for a pipelineWhen you enable the monitor.memory configuration property, you can use the Max Pipeline Memory pipeline property to define the maximum amount of memory uses when it runs the pipeline.
The monitor.memory property should only be enabled during development and testing.

When you configure the Max Pipeline Memory pipeline property, best practice is to configure the pipeline to use up to 65% of the Java heap size. For example, with the default Java heap size of 1024 MB, the highest setting for the pipeline memory should be 665 MB.
You can also configure the action to take when pipeline memory usage exceeds the configured amount.

p.note: To avoid errors, you might create an alert to indicate when the memory usage approaches the configured limit.
